title: File an Eviction for Non-Payment
description: A tenant has failed to pay rent or move out after being served a notice. The manager must begin the formal eviction process.

tasks.description: Verify that all prior notices (late notice, notice to pay or quit) were served correctly and have expired.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all legal prerequisites for eviction have been met.

tasks.description: Gather all necessary documentation: the lease, tenant ledger, and copies of all notices.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a complete file for the eviction.

tasks.description: Forward the complete file to the company's legal counsel to file the unlawful detainer lawsuit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully escalates the case to the attorney.
